item.title: Sublime Text 3配置
item.description: 安装 Packages 1、ctrl+` 2、输入命令： import urllib.request,os; pf = 'Package Control.sublime-package'; ipp = sublime.installed_packages_path(); urllib.request.install_opener( urllib.request.build_opener( urllib.request.ProxyHandler()) ); open(os.path.join(ipp, pf), 'wb').write(urllib.request.urlopen( 'http://sublime.wbond.net/' + pf.replace(' ','%20')).read()) Preferences > Settings -User基本的配置： { "font_size": 13, "ignored_packages": [ "Vintage" ], "spell_check": false, "font_face": "YaHei Consolas Hybrid", "trim_trailing_white_space_on_save": true, //去
